contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Olympics Qatar |games=1988 Summer |competitors=10 (10 men and 0 women) |sports=3 |flagbearer= |officials= }} '''[[Qatar]]''' competed at the '''[[1988 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Seoul]], [[South Korea|Korea]]. ==Results by event== ===[[Athletics at the 1988 Summer Olympics|Athletics]]=== '''Men's 10,000 metres''' * [[Ahmed Ebrahim Warsama]] :* Heat – 29:37.99 (â†’ did not advance) ==References== *[http://www.la84foundation.org/5va/reports_frmst.htm Official Olympic Reports] *[http://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/countries/QAT/summer/1988/ sports-reference] {{NOCin1988SummerOlympics}} [[Category:Nations at the 1988 Summer Olympics]] [[Category:Qatar at the Olympics|1988]] [[Category:1988 in Qatar|Olympics]] {{Qatar-sport-stub}} {{1988-Olympic-stub}}
